text: The Bad News Bears in Breaking Training is a 1977 American sports comedy movie directed by Michael Pressman and starring William Devane, Clifton James and Jackie Earle Haley. It was a sequel to the 1976 movie Bad News Bears. ==Other websites== * Category:1977 comedy movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:Bad News Bears movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Pressman Category:American sports comedy movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in Houston Category:American sequel movies Category:Baseball movies
title: The Bad News Bears in Breaking Training
